name: Flip the Bird
description: Play as Flip, fly thru the city collecting coins and shooting BadGuys. Get back to your cage before the time runs out. Use the coins you collected to upgrade yourself.  But beware , every time you upgrade something , you have to choose how to make the next level more difficult .  Use WSAD to move around, Right mouse to Aim, Left Mouse to shoot, Jump to toggle glider.  Fly thru a procedurally generated city that gets larger as you level up.
